languages.text: "Однако вместо того, чтобы очистить планету от ксеноугрозы, {mf|он|она} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}позволил{mf||а} чужакам укрыться{/d} в тени своего могущества. Даже сейчас они продолжают разлагать общество Януса изнутри. И кто знает — возможно, очередное восстание уже не за горами".

traits.locale_text: "Однако вместо того, чтобы очистить планету от ксеноугрозы, {mf|он|она} позволил{mf||а} чужакам укрыться в тени своего могущества. Даже сейчас они продолжают разлагать общество Януса изнутри. И кто знает — возможно, очередное восстание уже не за горами".

languages.text: "But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}allowed the inhumans to take refuge{/d} in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting Janusian society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."
languages.original_text: "Однако вместо того, чтобы очистить планету от ксеноугрозы, {mf|он|она} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}позволил{mf||а} чужакам укрыться{/d} в тени своего могущества. Даже сейчас они продолжают разлагать общество Януса изнутри. И кто знает — возможно, очередное восстание уже не за горами".

traits.locale_text: "But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} allowed the offworlders to take refuge in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting the Janus society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

"But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} allowed the offworlders to take refuge in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting the Janus society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

"But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} allowed the offworlders to take refuge in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting the Janus society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

"But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} allowed the offworlders to take refuge in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting the Janus society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

"But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} allowed the inhumans to take refuge in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting Janusian society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

"But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}allowed the inhumans to take refuge{/d} in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting Janusian society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

"But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}allowed the inhumans to take refuge{/d} in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting Janusian society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

languages.text: « Mais au lieu de purger la planète de la menace xénos, {mf|il|elle} a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}autorisé les non-humains à se réfugier{/d} à l'ombre de son influence. Ils corrompent la société janusienne en ce moment même et, qui sait, une autre rébellion ne tardera peut-être pas à éclater. »
languages.original_text: "But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}allowed the inhumans to take refuge{/d} in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting Janusian society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

traits.locale_text: « Mais au lieu de purger la planète de la menace xénos, {mf|il|elle} a autorisé les étrangers à se réfugier à l'ombre de son influence. Ils corrompent la société de Janus en ce moment même et, qui sait, une autre rébellion ne tardera peut-être pas à éclater. »

languages.text: “然而，行商浪人并没有消灭那颗行星的异形威胁，而是{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}让异形在{mf|他|她}的权力之下避难{/d}。就在我们说话的当下，那些异形就在不断腐化加努斯。谁知道呢？说不定另一场叛乱马上就要爆发了。”
languages.original_text: "But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}allowed the inhumans to take refuge{/d} in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting Janusian society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

traits.locale_text: “然而，行商浪人并没有消灭那颗行星的异形威胁，而是让异形在{mf|他|她}的权力之下避难。就在我们说话的当下，那些异形就在不断腐化加努斯。谁知道呢？说不定另一场叛乱马上就要爆发了。”

languages.text: 「ところが異種族の脅威を一掃する代わりに、{mf|彼|彼女}は彼らを{mf|彼|彼女}自身の権力の影に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}避難させた{/d}。今こうしている間にも異種族はヤヌスの社会を腐敗させており、次なる反乱がそう遠くないうちに起こる可能性もある」
languages.original_text: "But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}allowed the inhumans to take refuge{/d} in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting Janusian society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

traits.locale_text: 「ところが異種族の脅威を一掃する代わりに、{mf|彼|彼女}は彼らを{mf|彼|彼女}自身の権力の影に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}避難させた{/d}。今こうしている間にも異種族はヤヌスの社会を腐敗させており、次なる反乱がそう遠くないうちに起こる可能性もある」

languages.text: "Doch statt den Planeten von der Xenos-Bedrohung zu reinigen, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}erlaubte {mf|er|sie} den Unmenschen{/d}, unerkannt im Schatten {mf|seiner|ihrer} Macht zu agieren. Sie verderben die Gesellschaft von Janus, wahrscheinlich sogar genau in diesem Moment, und wer weiß, vielleicht steht die nächste Rebellion schon vor der Tür."
languages.original_text: "But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}allowed the inhumans to take refuge{/d} in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting Janusian society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

traits.locale_text: "Doch statt den Planeten von der Xenos-Bedrohung zu reinigen, erlaubte {mf|er|sie} den Außenweltlern, unerkannt im Schatten {mf|seiner|ihrer} Macht zu agieren. Sie verderben die Gesellschaft von Janus, wahrscheinlich sogar genau in diesem Moment, und wer weiß schon, vielleicht steht die nächste Rebellion schon direkt vor der Tür."

"Doch statt den Planeten von der Xenos-Bedrohung zu reinigen, erlaubte {mf|er|sie} den Unmenschen, unerkannt im Schatten {mf|seiner|ihrer} Macht zu agieren. Sie verderben die Gesellschaft von Janus, wahrscheinlich sogar genau in diesem Moment, und wer weiß, vielleicht steht die nächste Rebellion schon vor der Tür."

languages.text: «Pero en vez de purgar la amenaza alienígena del planeta, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}dejó que los inhumanos se refugiaran{/d} a la sombra de su poder. Están corrompiendo a la sociedad de Janus conforme hablamos, y quién sabe si no se producirá una nueva rebelión en un futuro no muy lejano».
languages.original_text: "But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}allowed the inhumans to take refuge{/d} in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting Janusian society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

traits.locale_text: «Pero en vez de purgar la amenaza alienígena del planeta, dejó que los xenos se refugiaran a la sombra de su poder. Están corrompiendo a la sociedad de Janus conforme hablamos, y quién sabe si no se producirá una nueva rebelión en un futuro no muy lejano».

languages.text: "Ancak gezegeni zeno tehdidinden tamamen arındırmak yerine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}insan dışıların, kendi gücünün gölgesine sığınmasına{/d} müsaade etmiştir. Biz burada konuştuğumuz sırada dâhi Janus toplumunu yozlaştırmayı sürdürüyorlar. Kim bilir... Belki yeni bir isyana kalkışmaları çok da ihtimal dışı değildir."
languages.original_text: "But instead of purging the planet of the xenos menace, {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}allowed the inhumans to take refuge{/d} in the shadow of {mf|his|her} power. They are corrupting Janusian society even as we speak, and who knows, perhaps another rebellion will not be long in coming."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegeni zeno tehdidinden tamamen arındırmak yerine insan dışıların, gücünün gölgesine sığınmasına müsaade etti ama. Biz burada konuştuğumuz sırada dâhi Janus toplumunu yozlaştırmayı sürdürüyorlar ve kim bilir, belki yeni bir isyan başlaması çok da ihtimal dışı değildir."
